name: Sinking mother earthship
description: in ancient times, when humans were still very dependent on nature. humans describe nature as a place of refuge, they even really praise nature and worship nature .. at that time, humans describe the earth or nature as a mother figure. mother figure who cares, protects selflessly. but when humans can outsmart nature and survive not entirely from nature, the context of motherhood in nature is slowly being abandoned. it's as if we let mother nature sink into our greed.
